item.description:
Join us at the Central Square branch of the Cambridge Public Library to workshop some writing of your peers.

Natty and Michelle have agreed to post for this week, so check in the Files section to download their works (files will be posted at least 4-5 days before the meetup). Read the pieces, and come prepared to discuss!


**A note on money:**
As always, the $3.00 fee only applies to those whose work we will be reading.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the front desk - we will be in the Rotary Conference Room.
item.name: Writing Workshop at the Library
